page.title: 13YOUTH LEISURE IN OAKLEY AREA
page.content:
{OAKLEY YOUTH CENTRE {MON}7-10(SENIOR)GAMES-CANTEEN-DISCO-TV {TUE}6:30-9:30(JUNIOR)SAME GAMES AS SNR {WED}7-10(SENIOR)GAMES-CANTEEN-DISCO-TV {THU}6:30-9:30(JUNIOR)SAMEGAMES AS SNR {FRI}6-9(INFANTS)GAMES-CANTEEN-SLIDE {SAT}12-1 SAME AS INFANTS {SUN}7-10(SENIOR)GAMES-CANTEEN-DISCO-TV { YOUTH CLUB OPENED 1969-70
{COMMUNITY CENTRE BLAIRHALL {MON}TAP DANCING(1HR) {TUE}6:30-8pm-AGE UP TO 11 { }8-10pm-11yrs UPWARDS {THU}6:30-8pm AGE UP TO 11 8-10pm-11yrs UPWARDS {There are two youth football teams in {Oakley,The Babes(u12)and the {Tigers(u13).There are Guides,Brownies, {BB's and Anchor Boys.
